member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat
member.summary: Specifies the image container format.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Unknown
member.summary: Unknown format.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Bmp
member.summary: BMP (Windows Bitmap Format), BMP Specification v5.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Gif
member.summary: GIF (Graphics Interchange Format 89a), GIF Specification 89a/89m.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Ico
member.summary: ICO (Icon Format).

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Jpeg
member.summary: JPEG (Joint Photographic Experts Group), JFIF Specification 1.02.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.JpegXR
member.summary: HD Photo, also known as Windows Media Photo.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Png
member.summary: PNG (Portable Network Graphics), PNG Specification 1.2.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicContainerFormat.Tiff
member.summary: TIFF (Tagged Image File Format), TIFF Specification 6.0.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType
member.summary: Specifies the type of dither algorithm to apply when converting between pixel formats.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.None
member.summary: A solid color algorithm without dither.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Solid
member.summary: A solid color algorithm without dither.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Ordered4x4
member.summary: A 4x4 ordered dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Ordered8x8
member.summary: An 8x8 ordered dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Ordered16x16
member.summary: A 16x16 ordered dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Spiral4x4
member.summary: A 4x4 spiral dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.Spiral8x8
member.summary: An 8x8 spiral dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.DualSpiral4x4
member.summary: A 4x4 dual spiral dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.DualSpiral8x8
member.summary: An 8x8 dual spiral dither algorithm.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicDitherType.ErrorDiffusion
member.summary: An error diffusion algorithm.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode
member.summary: Specifies the sampling or filtering mode to use when scaling an image.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode.NearestNeighbor
member.summary: A nearest neighbor interpolation algorithm. Also known as nearest pixel or point interpolation.
member.remarks: The output pixel is assigned the value of the pixel that the point falls within. No other pixels are considered.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode.Linear
member.summary: A bilinear interpolation algorithm.
member.remarks: The output pixel values are computed as a weighted average of the nearest four pixels in a 2x2 grid.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode.Cubic
member.summary: A bicubic interpolation algorithm.
member.remarks: Destination pixel values are computed as a weighted average of the nearest sixteen pixels in a 4x4 grid.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode.Fant
member.summary: A Fant resampling algorithm.
member.remarks: Destination pixel values are computed as a weighted average of the all the pixels that map to the new pixel.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicInterpolationMode.HighQualityCubic
member.summary: A high quality bicubic interpolation algorithm.
member.remarks: Destination pixel values are computed using a much denser sampling kernel than regular cubic. The kernel is resized in response to the scale factor, making it suitable for downscaling by factors greater than 2. This value is supported beginning with Windows 10.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType
member.summary: Specifies the type of palette used for indexed pixel formats.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.Custom
member.summary: An arbitrary custom palette provided by caller.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.MedianCut
member.summary: An optimal palette generated using a median-cut algorithm. Derived from the colors in an image.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedBW
member.summary: A black and white palette.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone8
member.summary: A palette that has its 8-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 16 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone27
member.summary: A palette that has 3 intensity levels of each primary: 27-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 35 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone64
member.summary: A palette that has 4 intensity levels of each primary: 64-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 72 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone125
member.summary: A palette that has 5 intensity levels of each primary: 125-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 133 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone216
member.summary: A palette that has 6 intensity levels of each primary: 216-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 224 colors are available.
member.remarks: This is the same as FixedHalftoneWeb.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedWebPalette
member.summary: A palette that has 6 intensity levels of each primary: 216-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 224 colors are available.
member.remarks: This is the same as WICBitmapPaletteTypeFixedHalftone216.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone252
member.summary: A palette that has its 252-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 256 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedHalftone256
member.summary: A palette that has its 256-color on-off primaries and the 16 system colors added. With duplicates removed, 256 colors are available.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedGray4
member.summary: A palette that has 4 shades of gray.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedGray16
member.summary: A palette that has 16 shades of gray.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType.FixedGray256
member.summary: A palette that has 256 shades of gray.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter
member.summary: Describes the PNG filters available for compression optimization.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Unspecified
member.summary: Indicates an unspecified PNG filter. This enables WIC to algorithmically choose the best filtering option for the image.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.None
member.summary: Indicates no PNG filter.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Sub
member.summary: Indicates a PNG sub filter.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Up
member.summary: Indicates a PNG up filter.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Average
member.summary: Indicates a PNG average filter.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Paeth
member.summary: Indicates a PNG paeth filter.

member.name: F:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPngFilter.Adaptive
member.summary: Indicates a PNG adaptive filter. This enables WIC to choose the best filtering mode on a per-scanline basis.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.GcWicBitmap.CreatePredefinedPalette(GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.WicPaletteType,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates one of the pre-defined palettes specified by PaletteType and optionally adds a transparent color.
member.param: The desired pre-defined palette type.
The optional transparent color to add to the palette. If no transparent color is needed, use false. When initializing to a grayscale or black and white palette, set this parameter to false.
member.remarks: For palettes with less than 256 entries, the transparent entry is added to the end of the palette (that is, a 16-color palette becomes a 17-color palette). For palettes with 256 colors, the transparent palette entry will replace the last entry in the pre-defined palette.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Imaging.Windows.GcWicBitmap.CreatePaletteFromBitmap(System.Int32,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates a palette using a computed optimized values based on the bitmap.
member.param: The number of colors to initialize the palette with.
A value to indicate whether to add a transparent color.
member.remarks: The resulting palette contains the specified number of colors which best represent the colors present in the bitmap. The algorithm operates on the opaque RGB color value of each pixel in the reference bitmap and hence ignores any alpha values. If a transparent color is required, set the addTransparentColor parameter to true and one fewer optimized color will be computed, reducing the colorCount, and a fully transparent color entry will be added.

member.name: T:GrapeCity.Documents.Text.Windows.FontLinkHelper
member.summary: Loads font links from the Windows Registry.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Text.Windows.FontLinkHelper.UpdateFontLinks(GrapeCity.Documents.Text.FontCollection,System.Boolean)
member.summary:
Appends font links to existing fonts in a FontCollection and (optionally) loads the missing referenced fonts.
Pass null in the fontCollection parameter to update the SystemFonts collection.

member.name: M:GrapeCity.Documents.Text.Windows.FontLinkHelper.UpdateEudcLinks(GrapeCity.Documents.Text.FontCollection)
member.summary:
Loads the linked EUDC fonts and registers the system default EUDC font as fallback font.
Pass null in the fontCollection parameter to update the SystemFonts collection.
